Name: Fool's Paradise
About the game: Meet Jack Roland. He lives like a ghost for the rest of the world. Jack denies that something is wrong with him. He lives in his memories, which slowly rides him crazy. Help Jack to open his eyes by getting through his dark adventure to the truth. Solve puzzles, explore Jack's memories and enjoy the ambient soundtrack.
Meta Title: Fool's Paradise: Sep 8, 2021, Alex V and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fool's Paradise? Check out the release date (Sep 8, 2021), developer insights from Alex V, and a complete game summary.
